title: Data analytics involving text

author: Dunja Mladenić, Artificial Intelligence Laboratory, Jožef Stefan Institute

segmentation: Welcome, thank you for coming.
I'll be presenting in English since we are at the International Graduate School and we probably have international audience.
So the title I decided for very general title, which is data analytics involving text.
Because as we heard text is really something that I have a history of working on, but later it got enriched with other kind of data.
So I just said it involves text but also potentially other kind.
Of data.
